alert.note: Alert for Charles City; James City; King William; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 1:54PM EDT until July 19 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL CHARLES CITY...NEW KENT...SOUTHEASTERN KING WILLIAM AND NORTHWESTERN JAMES CITY COUNTIES... At 153 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Providence Forge, or near Roxbury, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Talleysville around 205 PM EDT. New Kent around 210 PM EDT. West Point around 230 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Eltham, Wrights Corner, Chickahominy Shore, Mountcastle, Cohoke, Lanexa, Quinton, Colonial Downs, Browns Corner and Sandybottom. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; James City; King William; New Kent
